Access applications to ASPNETSQL Server applications Mentored junior team members regarding SQL Server TSQL SSIS and SSRS Senior Database Administrator Lockheed Martin September 2009 to May 2011 2008 Built web applications using ASPNET 35 C and SQL Server 20052008 Programmer Kelsey Advertising and Design September 2008 to August 2009 Developed applications using PHP5 MySQL 5 JavaScript and
